definition: to prohibit the use of sth/to ban/(computing) to disable
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Those with low blood pressure and hyperchlorhydria are forbidden to drink. When antibiotics are taken, this juice is also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 低血压及胃酸过多的人士忌用，服用抗生素期间禁用。

sentences.english: VTP trap is disabled by default.
sentences.chinese: VTP的陷阱默认情况下禁用。

sentences.english: "White Valentine's Day" originated Rome of three jerkins at the earliest stage.
sentences.chinese: “白禁用词语人节”最早起源于三世纪时的罗马。

sentences.english: Atomic weapons are forbidden because of their hugely destructive effects.
sentences.chinese: 原子武器由于具有极大的破坏性而被禁用。

sentences.english: The AutoDisabled flag is cleared when the system goes offline.
sentences.chinese: 自动禁用的标记将在系统掉线时清除。

sentences.english: Disabling, refractory knee pain that meets both of the following criteria.
sentences.chinese: 禁用，难治性膝关节疼痛，符合以下两个条件。

sentences.english: Indicates if the processor is running with interrupts disabled.
sentences.chinese: 表示处理器是否在中断禁用的情况下运行。
禁用“可分解芳香胺染料”。

sentences.english: You can also globally enable or disable all key acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以整个开始使用或禁用全数键位加快。

sentences.english: Status on whether VTP trap generation mode is enabled or disabled.
sentences.chinese: VTP的状态是否陷阱生成模式是启用或禁用。

sentences.english: Disabled toggling Fullscreen mode in game.
sentences.chinese: 禁用切换全屏模式的游戏。

sentences.english: We can disable this behavior by defining the closure to be static.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以通过将闭包定义为静态闭包禁用此行为。

sentences.english: Controls enabling and disabling of IME input composition.
sentences.chinese: 控制IME输入组合的启用和禁用。

sentences.english: I will disable it again after the migration.
sentences.chinese: 我将在迁移结束后再次禁用它。

sentences.english: When disabled, only local connections through named pipes are allowed.
sentences.chinese: 当禁用本地连接，只允许通过命名管道。

definition: to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to stop using/to suspend/to discontinue/to disable
quinolone (a hydroxylated quinoline, inhibiting the replication of bacterial DNA)
glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)
to change over to/to switch to/to use (sth different)
